author: brett
msg: rename the test wagon to something more appropriate now

author: rajith
msg: The last checkin for this class was using a Java 1.6 specific method called isEmpty in the String class.
This fails the build in Java 1.5. I modified it to use str.length == 0 which has the same effect.

author: brett
msg: [MARTIFACT-28] if an artifact has an md5 but no sha1, a null pointer exception results

author: adrianc
msg: Improved screen widget UI label rendering - now expands expressions contained in UI labels (${...}).

author: gdamour
msg: Fix a classloader clash happening when a WADI clustered application is
deployed: Tribes classes were loaded by the configurations
imports org.apache.geronimo.configs/tomcat6//car and hides the Tribes classes.
When a WADI clustered application is built, the tomcat6 configuration is
removed from the clustered application ancestor list and replaced by
tomcat6-no-ha. Tribes classes are now loaded by wadi-clustering.
